review: Works as well or better than a Roku, but does not have the same number of channels available as the Roku. Finding a channel is not very easy either. Picture quality is great. Will stick with this for a while and see how it goes.

review: The fire stick is awesome. I travel a lot and this is the only device that works on the hotel WiFi. Setup was a breeze, I was up and running in less than 10 mins. Loving it now....
